fields.label: Legal name
fields.helperText: Enter the registered legal name as per incorporation documents.

fields.label: Trading name
fields.helperText: If different from legal name, provide the trading/brand name.

fields.label: Regulator name
fields.helperText: If multiple licenses, list one per line or provide latest.

fields.label: Source of wealth (for >=10% owners)
fields.helperText: Provide brief narrative on source of wealth.

fields.label: Business description
fields.placeholder: Briefly describe the regulated business model and value proposition.

fields.label: I confirm the information is accurate
I undertake to comply with regulatory requirements
